name: YOU ARE OUT OF UNIFORM SOLDIER
desc: Donít have any? You expect me to believe that, maggot? The truth is that you lost an expensive piece of army-issue equipment. That suit is going to come out of your pay, and you are going to remain in this mans army until you are five hundred and ten years old, which is the number of years it will take for you to pay for a Mark II Powered Combat Armor you have lost! Report to the armory and have a new suit issued to you, then report back to me, private! Dismissed!

name: Live Fast, Die Young
desc:
The crew, not the ship. How itís always the biggest slackers and worst marathon runners that end up on phase ship is a mystery.
Well, not really. Itís actually pretty simple. There are already periods of downtime in combat. Can you imagine having three times as much free time? Phase ships are the bollocks.
Wait, this isnít a phase ship? WHY THE HELL DIDNíT ANYONE TELL ME OH SHIT OH FU-
